Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 2.5.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.5.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Navippayutta
Kusalattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Navippayutta
222.
725Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—  arūpe kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā. (1)
726Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—  arūpe akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā. (1)
727Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—  arūpe vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā. (Navippayutte paṭisandhi natthi.) (1)
